entry.value:
SELECT -- *
nsi.scan_id, nsi.history_id, access_token, secret_token FROM nessus_scans_info nsi INNER JOIN nessus_scans_history nsh ON nsi.history_id = nsh.history_id LEFT JOIN nessus_sessions ns ON ns.id = 1 WHERE is_csv_imported = false AND nsh.status = 'completed' AND nsh.is_empty IS NULL AND nsi.scan_start > '2020-01-01 00:00:00.000000' ORDER BY nsi.scan_start DESC

INSERT INTO nessus_scans_host_metric ( history_id, critical, high, medium, low, info, hostname ) VALUES ( ${history_id}, ${critical}, ${high}, ${medium}, ${low}, ${info}, '${hostn}' ) ON CONFLICT (history_id, hostname) DO NOTHING;
SELECT scan_id, history_id, access_token, secret_token FROM nessus_scans_history LEFT JOIN nessus_sessions ns ON ns.id = 1 WHERE status = 'completed' AND is_imported = false;

INSERT INTO nessus_report ( history_id, plugin_id, cve, cvss, risk, host, protocol, port, name, synopsis ) VALUES ( ${history_id}, ${plugin_id}, '${cve}', ${cvss}, '${risk}', '${host}', '${protocol}', ${port}, '${name}', '${synopsis}' );

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value:
INSERT INTO nessus_scans ( name, scan_id, folder_id, start_time, modified_on, date_created, status, enabled, frequency, interval, days ) VALUES ( '${name}', ${id}, ${folder_id}, '${starttime}', to_timestamp(${last_modification_date}), to_timestamp(${creation_date}), '${status}', ${enabled}, '${frequency}', ${interval}, '${days}'
) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT scan_id_unique DO UPDATE SET modified_on = to_timestamp(${last_modification_date}), status = '${status}', folder_id = ${folder_id}, enabled = ${enabled}, frequency = '${frequency}', interval = ${interval}, days = '${days}', start_time = '${starttime}';
SELECT scan_id, access_token, secret_token FROM nessus_scans LEFT JOIN nessus_sessions ns ON ns.id = 1 WHERE status = 'completed'; -- AND scan_id = 532

{ "format": "csv", "reportContents": { "csvColumns": { "id": true, "cve": true, "cvss": true, "risk": true, "hostname": true, "protocol": true, "port": true, "plugin_name": true, "synopsis": true, "description": false, "solution": false, "see_also": false, "plugin_output": false, "stig_severity": false, "cvss3_base_score": false, "cvss_temporal_score": false, "cvss3_temporal_score": false, "risk_factor": false, "references": false, "plugin_information": false, "exploitable_with": false } } }

UPDATE nessus_scans_history SET is_csv_imported = TRUE, is_empty = CASE WHEN '${RouteOnContent.Route}' = 'unmatched' THEN TRUE WHEN '${RouteOnContent.Route}' = 'is_full' THEN FALSE END --'${RouteOnContent.Route}' WHERE history_id = ${history_id};

INSERT INTO nessus_scans_info ( scan_id, folder_id, history_id, name, status, scan_start, scan_end, hosts ) VALUES ( ${scan_id}, ${folder_id}, ${history_id}, '${name}', '${status}', to_timestamp(${scan_start}), to_timestamp(${scan_end}), '${targets}' ) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT pk_hid DO UPDATE SET status = '${status}', scan_end = to_timestamp(${scan_end})

entry.value: INSERT INTO nessus_scans_history ( scan_id, history_id, status ) VALUES ( ${scan_id}, ${history_id}, '${status}' ) ON CONFLICT (history_id) DO UPDATE SET status = '${status}'
